jd: From: Kaushik, vysystems karthick.raja@vysystems.com Reply to: karthick.raja@vysystems.com Job Description:(12+ Years Exp)Should have hands-on experience managing GCP services such as GCE, GKE, IAM, GCS , pub-sub and other commonly used services beforeUnderstanding of usage of Cloud API’s and integrationSMEs need experience building apps for various API calls (usage reporting, Pub/Sub, etc.)Knowledge of Front end development and debugging techniquesGeneral understanding of SaaS platforms/architectures and deployment types to support partner queriesPreferably have a GCP Cloud Solution Architect certification Role/Responsibilities:• SMEs need experience building apps for various API calls (usage reporting, Pub/Sub, etc.)• Knowledge of Front end development and debugging techniques• General understanding of SaaS platforms / architectures and deployment types to support partner queries• Preferably have a GCP Cloud Solution Architect certification• Understanding of core cloud concepts of Architecture and Best practices• Exposure to common services such as GCE, GKE, IAM, GCS, PUB SUB and Service accounts• Understanding of APIs and usage• Concepts of Load balancing, Deployment manager and TF will be helpful• Expertise level can be lower than L2 with a potential to groom• Preferably have GCP Associate Cloud Engineer certification
